entry.string: SiteContact is a simple module that allows visitors to easily contact the Site Administrator by email.
entry.translation: SiteContact ist ein einfaches Modul, das den Besuchern der Website den schnellen Kontakt zum Website-Administrator per Email ermöglicht.

entry.string: Install SiteContact as usual from the administration Module listing. There are no tables involved. Then, setup the module configuration in Modify Config option.
entry.translation: Installieren Sie das Modul "Sitecontact" wie gewohnt im Administrationsbereich des Moduls "Module" -> Module-Auflistung. Es sind keine Tabellen betroffen. Die Modulkonfiguration lässt sich dann unter dem Punkt "Modulkonfiguration" dieses Moduls beeinflussen.

entry.string: There are a number of variables you can set in the Modify Config option. If any are left blank, a default is provided.
entry.translation: Es gibt eine Anzahl von Variablen, die Sie bei der Option Modulkonfiguration setzen können. Wenn einige leer sind, ist dies standardmäßig vorgesehen.

entry.string: Check the Short URL checkbox to use short urls
entry.translation: Zur Verwendung von ShortUrls die Option auswählen

entry.string: You can use HTML in your emails or in the configurable text that displays in SiteContact pages. But, please, if you do, make sure you have HTML allowed in your site by configuring the HTML module to use the HTML tags you wish to use.

Note that you can use HTML email in Sitecontact by checking the Use HTML Email option in the SiteContact configuration. This will allow HTML mail just for Sitecontact module, even if your default mail setup is text.

By default, all emails are sent to the administrator email address specified in the Mail module. You can override this for each of the Subject options of your feedback form. Just add the subject option and alternative email in the form:
The line must end with a comma. The semi-colon and optional email can be omitted. Don't forget to test your setup by sending yourself an email through SiteContact!

The HTML and text emails that are sent to the website contact (admin or other) and the user are based on templates in the module's xartemplate directory. There is a text and an HTML version for both the Admin notification email (user-adminmail-text.xd and user-adminmail-html.xd) and the user (user- usermail-text.xd and user-usermail-html.xd).

Hook Dynamic Data to Site Contact and setup your custom dynamic data property fields. These currently assume the output of the dynamic data is string type. Your Dynamic Data fields will be included in outgoing emails by default, but you can further template the dynamic data output in the respective templates.
Extended information about this module can be found at http://xaraya.athomeandabout.com
entry.translation: Ausführlichere Informationen befinden sich auf http://xaraya.athomeandabout.com.
